name: Operation Metal Lab
description:
Infiltrate a shady laboratory and discover the secrets hidden within it. Walk through the corridors of the lab avoiding enemies and security cameras while trying to collect all the keys to progress.

Operation Metal Lab is a top-down tactical shooter where the player has a limited field of view and must eliminate enemies and colect keys to progress through the stages.

Controls W, A, S, DCharacter Movement MouseLook Around Left ClickShoot Right ClickAim Left ShiftRun1, 2, 3, 4Switch WeaponsMouse WheelZoom In/OutRReload Credits

This game was developed by Renan Henrique de Sousa, Rodrigo Andre Cayro Cuadros, Rogério Lübe, Samuel Veronez and Vitor Fernando Rinaldini  for the 2022 SSC0770 (Introduction to game Development) class at USP - São Carlos
